title: "A Real Challenger" mission problem
body:
Does anyone now why I am stuck at** 1/4** and have **no** missions left?
I really want to get the world tokens but this mission makes no sense... **please help**

replies.body:
You seeing the mission that requires you to complete 4 Worlds Missions already? I'm looking at your account on the backend, and it's showing that you haven't completed the very first mission yet, which unlocks the others. Honestly, you shouldn't even be able to see the 1/4 mission progress without completing Welcome to Worlds first. 

Were you talking about a different account? Shoot me a quick screenshot of your mission progress from the client so I can dig a little more and figure this out for you!

I too have just that.  i  completed 1 mission, so i have 1/4

is there other missions out already or no?

I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM! please help, cant I get Golden Ashe Chroma now? (it say's 1/4 completed, I can provide screenshots!)
I see the same problem on the NA forums!
I have the same issue Broporo, how do I send a Screenshot?

I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM! please help, cant I get Golden Ashe Chroma now? (it say's 1/4 completed, I can provide screenshots!)
I see the same problem on the NA forums!
New missions for the Worlds Event will appear every week or so. Just wait until then.
